page.title: 06WORKING AS AN AIR HOSTESS
page.content: I am 22 yrs old and work as an{Air {Hostess}with Dan Air Services. I work approx 37 hrs a week averaging 6-9 hrs per flight on BAC 1-11 and Boeing 727 aeroplanes, which carry approx 100 passengers to Europe and as far as Israel. I have a temporary contract at present. I am supplied with a wardrobe of uniform and must look smart. I serve passengers with food and drink and sell duty free goods. I am trained for aeroplane emergencies and first aid, and meet many interesting people. Physically 1 hrs work aboard plane is equivalent to 2 hrs on the ground and my feet and stomach swell under air craft pressure. I rent a house in Horley which is near Gatwick Airport. I own a car and drive to work. I wish to carry on working for 2 more years as a permanent employee.
